attributes.action: Introduce a UK National Identity Card for all citizens over the age of 16
attributes.additional_details: To enable individuals identities to be integrated into the UK to monitor and register valid citizenship as part of the National Census and contribute to a reduction in crime
attributes.background:
To consider a mandatory introduction of National Identity Cards for all
UK Citizens over the age of 16

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715184
